@TomMerlevede Wildlife center, lucky you! It's always great to have a real experience with animals. Yep, I live and work in Brussels! =)
@TomMerlevede A summary would be great! It could be useful to communicate about ur thesis. But only if you feel like it! =) Thanks Tom!
@TomMerlevede Ah we're not far away then. Next time you're going to Brussels, let me know! Would love to catch up with you
@TomMerlevede oh woah, congrats! We really need to keep in touch then! Is ur thesis going to be written in Dutch? Would love to read it
@TomMerlevede thanks for reaching out and please keep in touch :) where do u study philosophy btw? Cheers to you!!
@TomMerlevede will definitely have a look at Martha Nussbaum's critic yes. Anything that makes the AR movement stronger is important
@TomMerlevede I know, Singer gets a lot of black lash on his utilitarian philosophy. U know probably know more than me on the subject
@TomMerlevede I agree with his theory of equal consideration of interests. Don't know about Nussbaum though! Will have a look at his work ;)
@TomMerlevede Hard to develop my answer in tweet but would say Peter Singer. His book #Animalliberation really started the #animalrights mvt
